Articles.Content:
New to this forum but been playing ksp for quite some time. Simply cannot wait for the next update.

I do have one concern. I\'ve taken a look around the official website and did a search of the forum but could not find whether or not the development team has ever mentioned allowing youtube letsplays or not. I\'m quite curious about this because as I monetize all my videos I need expressed permission and therefore I can\'t create anything and cannot help spread the game to my viewers.

Yes, everyone does Letsplays and since there\'s a load of them already on youtube (with me being one of them from time to time) I can definitely say they\'re all for the free advertisement.

So go ahead!

Also welcome to the forums! Make sure to link your work for all of us to enjoy!

Your friendly neighborhood bag of bones,

-Drakomis

Welcome!

Happy launching.

Enjoy your time playing KSP!

-Joey73101

(I\'m getting bored with always trying to beat skunky...)

(I need a new thing to put here...)

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

Thank you for all your welcomes and the advice I certainly will

Unfortunately to avoid risk of having my channel suffering from my mistake I would need some kind of link to anything as simple as a forum post or a mention in passing. Otherwise I would be limited to tutorial type videos of which I could make the claim of fair use towards.
